cause.description:
This cause is to help educate people about these misunderstood dogs. When raised to be a part of a family and not for the owner's twisted amusement pit bulls can be the most loving and loyal dogs. The cruel training a fighting pit goes through confuses the dog at first because he wishes only to please his owner and doesn't understand why they would want to hurt them.
1. End dog fighting
2. Bring dogfighters to justice
3. Http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DwI_qlq5vHs
cause.mission: end cruelty to pit bulls and any other breed used in dog fighting.
cause.name: End dog fighting! pit bulls are not monsters.
